pageDesc: Discover our new range of PU Holds and Fiber Volumes.

props.description: Climbing on these new and original shapes is like embarking on a long and adventurous journey.

paragraphs.name: name23
paragraphs.desc: Need to set a dyno with some palm compression involved ? Look no further.

paragraphs.name: name0
paragraphs.desc: When looking for a name, Odyssey ended up first. The word itself means a long and adventurous journey, and that's exactly what we want to offer with this range. The possibility to create adventurous and original movements.

paragraphs.name: name1
paragraphs.desc: These innovative grips offer new possibilities for setters, allowing climbers to hang on with ease but pulling is going to be hard.

paragraphs.name: name2
paragraphs.desc: The comfortable rounded edges are perfect for creating Fontainebleau-style compressions or dynamic moves.

paragraphs.name: name3
paragraphs.desc: Explore 32 PU holds and 17 fiberglass volumes (with a dual-texture option) for endless climbing opportunities.

paragraphs.title: Offering a positive grip
paragraphs.desc: When set on a slab, the Odyssey range offers a positive, easier grip, for any level.

paragraphs.title: To more technical and demanding moves
paragraphs.desc: When turned sideways, the Odyssey range offers a more technical and demanding grip, requiring more body tension and technique.
